title: Did the widow of the American sniper Chris Kyle criticize the Colin Kibernik campaign launched by Niki?
subtitle: Taya Kyle wrote on Facebook that the campaign message "Sacrifice Everything" was "an insult to those who really sacrificed everything."
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: In September 2018, Taya Kyle published a Facebook message that was highly critical of the accent and slogan of the Nike campaign that was recently not carried out with Colin Kaybernik.
